ValidationRule.description: D-0743: Offer Creation when Sales Phase is 'Create Offer (Bid)' or 'Win the Case'. Req 943: Allowing offer creation from intial Sales Phase. : Req 888 - For New Sales Path (Updated on 30-05-2017).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', OR( Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Read_Only', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Read_Only_Indirect' ), OR( TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Submitted for G2 Approval', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Submitted for G3 Approval', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Submitted for G4 Approval', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Submitted for G5 Approval', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Submitted for G6 Approval', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Closed', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Closed(not won)', TEXT(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c) = 'Closed Handover', TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = 'Handover (Prepare for Delivery)', TEXT( Opportunity__r.StageName) = 'Execute (Start Delivery)', TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = 'Closed' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Offer cannot be created past G5 or when Opportunity is locked.
